 ∙ The CHO/ANM will record the test results in the MCP card and RCH register. All positive cases should be 
followed up for treatment.
Urine Test for the presence of sugar To diagnose women with gestational diabetes
Gestational diabetes (GDM) is a 
condition of high blood glucose levels 
among women during pregnancy. It usually 
disappears after the birth of the baby.
Risk factors 
• Obesity - with a BMI of 30 or ov
